section.title: RexxC Utility Program
section.para: When RexxC encounters a syntax error in a Rexx program while tokenizing or syntax checking it, RexxC returns the negated ooRexx error code. In addition, RexxC issues the following errors:

section.title: Error 127 - The REXXC command parameters are incorrect.
section.para:
The REXXC utility was invoked with zero or more than three parameters. REXXC accepts the following parameters:
To check the syntax of a REXX program: REXXC Program_name [-s]
To convert a REXX program into a sourceless executable file: REXXC Program_name Output_file_name [-s]
The -s option will suppress the copyright banner.

section.title: Error 128 - Output file name must be different from input file name.
Error 130 - Without OutProgramName REXXC only performs a syntax check.
